xwikidoc.content: llm.editor.modal.title=LLM Assistant llm.ui.copy=Copy llm.ui.copyLabel=Copy the message to clipboard. llm.ui.include=Include llm.ui.includeLabel=Include the message in the edited page. llm.ui.submit=Submit Chat llm.ui.stop=Stop llm.ui.newconv=New Conversation llm.ui.assistantInfoName=Assistant llm.ui.editButton=Edit llm.ui.editLabel=Move the message in the message edition area. llm.ui.configRedir=Configuration llm.ui.promptDBRedir=Prompt Database llm.ui.param=Advanced Settings llm.config.label=LLM Assistant Configuration llm.config.label.hint=Configuration for the LLM application, need at least one configuration with one model and the associated URL prefix/token to work. The URL prefix should allow access to /models endpoint and /chat/completions. For example, if the prefix looks like http://example.url.com/ then http://example.url.com/models and http://example.url.com/chat/completions should be accesible. llm.config.name=Server Name llm.config.url=URL prefix llm.config.token=Token llm.config.configfile=Configuration File llm.config.delete=Delete llm.config.requestmode=Can Stream llm.config.groups=Group Allowed
